Report.Query: SELECT yearmonth AS YearMonth, emp_count AS EmpCount, driver_count AS DriverCount, steward_count AS StewardCount, dispatcher_count AS DispatcherCount, ticket_supervisor_count AS TicketSupervisorCount, clerk_count AS ClerkCount, section_chief_count AS SectionChiefCount, others_count AS OthersCount, male_count AS MaleCount, female_count AS FemaleCount, area_code AS AreaCode, org_group AS OrgGroup, org_group_id AS OrgGroupId, business_date AS BusinessDate FROM rpt_infra_employee
